item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week we're going to a place we've NEVER BEEN BEFORE!

The Winchester Restaurant and Bar

The Winchester has good beer collection, great cocktails and their wines are selected by their house sommelier to pair up with all their dishes.

 

All of their food is made fresh, in house, right down to their mayo and mustard.    The owners have transformed a boring sportsbar into a destination restaurant with a powerful bar, a great atmosphere and wonderful food.(They have a killer mac and cheese!)

Video on The Winchester: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPlxGYQwkK4&feature=youtu.be

Special: $1 off Drafts and Well Drinks and Appetizers

1/2 off Wings

The contact for this event is Dev, phone number in RSVP

http://www.thewinchesterct.com/

Hope to see you all there. Please note that they're in a little side street, so don't miss it; They have their own parking lot so no worries on that end.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... it's a come-whenever-you-want kind of thing.

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: 8/27 Happy Hour: (New Location for us!)The Winchester Restaurant and Bar
